titles.title: Expressing support for designation of October 2, 2014, as World MRSA Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 11/19/2014--Introduced. Expresses support for the designation of World MRSA Day and International MRSA Testing Week. (MRSA is an acronym for methicillin-resistant staphylococcus aureus, which causes deadly infections in patients in health care facilities and within communities.)
